snippet: Fee-conscious investors have been putting pressure on fund companies to lower their annual costs — and have found some success.
abstract: Fee-conscious investors have been putting pressure on mutual fund companies to lower their annual costs--and have found some success; fund fees have declined in general, but remain all over the board.
lead_paragraph: Fee-conscious investors have been putting pressure on fund companies to lower their annual costs — and have found some success.

headline.seo: Mutual Fund Fees Are Declining, but Still Vary Widely
headline.main: What a Difference a Percentage Point Can Make
headline.print_headline: What a Difference A Percentage Point Can Make
